review: I went to his clinic for a leg pain by booking appointment through practo.He is listening to all our problems politely  and advising us with appropriate  medication and proper diet if any. Very approachable Doctor.The staffs are very polite.I would recommend him for any ortho problems for sure. Little bit expensive in case of any lab tests but never mind it.(Doctor Kindly enlarge waiting hall size)

i had back pain for the past 7 months i would already took physio treatment in outside area but it is not sastified.  Then my friend is suggest to do physio in this clinic . finally i took physiotherapy treatment in this clinic the male therapist will took more care of the patient side im fully satisfied with the entire treatment session now i feel really good. But one thing is he is available only in evening better if he available in the morning it is more convenient for me.

My daughter got airline crack in right hand near tennis elbow. Everything was good in explaining the issue and xray. They advised to put POP bandage and charged me 1800/- only for POP. When I asked why this much cost they simply told that they are using best pop. *** * ******* *** *** **** *** ***** ** **** ****** *** **** **** **** * ******** ***** **** *** ***   **** ******** **** ***** *** This is not at all accepted.** *** *** **** *** ****** **  ******* *** **** ****** ****** They asked to visit after 1week and told they may need to extend the bandage if it got loosen. They said they will charge same Rs.1800/- I straight away told that I won't visit this clinic one more time.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I slipped myswlf while coming outof washroom and i landed myself with fullbweight in left wrist.ain increased along woth swelling. Booked appointment in practo and went. Doctor checked and asked me to take x-ray. The nurse who handled me was not friendly and was pressing my wrist at pain point.
Doctor just wrote the medicine and gave us. Until we ask te questions he didn't explain what was the issue. He said its an airlone crack and i need to put crape bandage and if pain is there even the white bandage. Myself and my husband qas not convinced with his treatment also they charged 500 for xray costlier than outside.

Took a second consultation to a different doctor *** ** **** *** **** * ****** *** ***** ** ** **** * ***** ********

Not even a Star for this place .. Highly not recommended uwill not be able to claim even 1 rupee if u have insurance.. 

No GSTN number. **** ** **** **** ******* *** ** **** ** ***** When ased for name on xray they are writing the name on xray sheet with white Pencile. 

When asked for system generated bill . Receptionist says even then GSTN number will not be provided .  

Patient had a broken ankle and the staff at the reception says to wait as there are OP patients in que for consultation.  A patient with emergency situation is asked to wait in que ?? The receptionist is very rude and unprofessional.. No proper planning .. Doctor takes care of patients and comes out in middle for taking xray himself.. 

Xray report takes 1 hour .. when asked the best answer is that Xray is drying it's wet still.. ?? ******** ** **** * **

Expensive place.. 

Medicine are only avilable in their pharmacy.
Doctor patiently listened to the problems and explained what could be the problem. After x-ray, he explained the reason for pain and offered advice for recovery. Would recommend.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Too many medicines like generic vitamin tablets, also some common medicines is prescribed which is not required. Wait time could be avoided if planned properly.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: The Doctor was very friendly and explained the problem clearly. I had a great relief from the pain in the first day after visiting the doctor.

The doctor was very understanding and heard out my issue and didn't over prescribe medication or physiotherapy. In clinic physiotherapist helped me understand how to prevent future injuries. Great experience would recommend. Very affordable.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,

here i had nice experience with doctor and more convenient with male physio.
and more over the receptionist polite explanation of medicine and all other things is very nice but the x ray woman is like rude.
Not satisfied with the treatment and the medicines given by him is not available in any medical shops. He is making the patients to buy medicines in his clinic only.

My brother had a sports injury(Ligament) in his knee.  Dr was very descriptive in explaining the problem and abt his analysis too. Gave proper treatment and brother was able to recover within few days. Thank you Doctor

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: Very bad experience. Please do not visit this place. Took my baby there and he had no little patience ** ***** *** **** ********* No explanation, no proper cause details nothing. Neither treated too. Less than a minute but charged 400. Money isnt problem and that amount is spent for nothing at all.!

After consultation with doctor I ve been kept in waited in physiotherapy for more than 1 hour wantedly. There is no organized way of treatment at physiotherapy section and the lady incharge behaved me in rude manner. I have not given necessary supporting bills for my treatment and for the medicine bought in the hospital eventhough i asked for it many times. Eventhough the doctor treated me in good manner i wouldnot suggest anybody further.

No need to think twice to recommend.. very good doctor for ortho n about hospital is small one bt u can get x ray n dressing there itself instantly. 
No need to get appointment , u can directly visit to hospital .
The doctor is described issue well and gave good medicine which gave quick  relief ********** * **** *** **** ** *********** *** ****** ******** *******
Very kind and patience to hear what patient is saying about problems... Good in analyzing problems. Before taking x-ray itself he told the problem. Took x-ray just to confirm. Thanks.
Dr. Could tell the actual problem to the respective patient without wasting time and money of the patient.
Visited to check Leg pain for my mother. After taking x-ray the doctor explained the reason to our full understanding and prescribed physiotherapy. Really satisfied with the treatment.
Doctor was explained clearly about the status of pain and reason. It was very helpful. We also learnt something because of him.

Good.explain everything clearly.******* ****.i am facing an issue from 21days.can't able to be found from which place I am feeling issue.he suggested some of the tests to find out the root cause.finally,he is explained everything in clear in manner.

Doctor is handling the patience very kind.. Awesome service from Siva Kumar...


Thanks
Karthik g
8807208545

Very good Doctor. Completely satisfied. Referred for the entire family.

He is a doctor with humanity and not money minded.

The medicine doctor prescribe cannot be purchased outside. If you ask the front desk, the response is not polite. Doctor does consultation and Medicines. You cannot force the patient to purchase the medicines as well.
Excellent... Listened patiently... Was advised for an x-ray. The clinic has xray unit attached and physiotherapy too.
